meanings.definition: The basic monetary unit of Nigeria.
meanings.sent1: In Nigeria, you can buy snacks with a few naira.
meanings.sent2: She exchanged her dollars for naira at the bank.
meanings.sent3: The naira in my pocket seemed to disappear magically.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was like a rain of naira on the charity event.
meanings.sent5: The sound of coins clinking together was music to her ears, especially when it was naira.

meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Nigeria.
meanings.sent1: The price of the item was listed in naira on the menu.
meanings.sent2: He counted his naira carefully before making the purchase.
meanings.sent3: The naira in his wallet whispered temptations of spending.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was worth more than a bag full of naira.
meanings.sent5: The naira bills crumpled in his hand, a tangible reminder of hard work.

meanings.sent1: Tourists need to exchange their currency for naira when visiting Nigeria.
meanings.sent2: The government announced new security features on the naira notes.
meanings.sent3: The naira felt important in his hands, like a symbol of national pride.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as strong as the value of the naira against foreign currencies.
meanings.sent5: The naira symbol on the banknote was a mark of national identity.
